website_summaries.verdict: Single floor-standing speaker with a tall, narrow design that allows it to be less noticeable.
pros: Works very well to give a normal sized room a full sound
Tweeter's design is able to broadcast sound over a wide area
Physical design of the speaker helps to minimize problems with audio distortion
Can handle input power up to 145 watts
cons: Costs a bit more than some other speakers with similar audio quality and output

website_summaries.verdict: The best overall floorstanding speaker option that balances affordability and high-quality sound production.
pros: Overall size and design offer a small profile that fits into a variety of tight spaces in the home
Sound production is better than most due to the large three-way, four-speaker setup
cons: Balance between the low, middle, and high ends of the frequency range is skewed toward the ends

customer_reviews.title: Love these, awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, my surround system has been transformed by these. Really great for action movies, excellent clarity and impact. IMO they perform well above their price point. I've got two of the towers and the center. I'll land up replacing my current rears with the bookshelfs soon. I've read the sub is not up to snuff with the rest so I'll probably look elsewhere for an upgraded sub when I get there, current (other sony) sub is holding up with these.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy Oh

customer_reviews.title: After seeing all of the good reviews on these speakers i figured they would be ...
customer_reviews.text: After seeing all of the good reviews on these speakers i figured they would be good and that they are. Nice clarity and definition not tinny sounding, they handle bass well, though a subwoofer compliments them well. , good build quality ,they are a good size not too big not too small. My living room is not large so i might not recommend if you do they might seem small or not sound as good.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M.

customer_reviews.title: For floor speaker be patient until price drop
customer_reviews.text: Sony is not know for great speakers but these have received good reviews that are easy to find with a Google search. The best part is that you can score a pair for $200 if you time your purchase right. They have been available for $98 here a few times, and that means they will likely be again. At that price they are awesome, they sure don't sound like a bargain speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Kazo

customer_reviews.title: Bought on SALE
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this because I live in an apartment and did not want to annoy my neighbors with deep bass bumping like other brands in this price range had. The sound is clear and clean. The finish is very nice and looks great. Compared to other units at regular everyday prices I would rate this a 3 out of 5 stars. Again this fit my needs and bought during Prime Days was a bargain. If I had to pay full MSRP I would have bought another brand. I use it for gaming, TV, Movies and Music. Great for apartments and Dorms.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: On recommendation from Sony care, I bought replacement speakers for my vintage stereo. These are great speakers. The sounds clear and crisp. Bought them to listen to old vinyl. Sounds way better than digital music. Love my new speakers. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: patricia g mccrite

customer_reviews.title: For music, get a sub woofer
customer_reviews.text: I paired these with a Sonos Amp but was somewhat disappointed until I added a Polk sub woofer . . . very happy now. Note, I only use these for music not a TV surround. Cranked up they sound really great and all for about 850.00
customer_reviews.author: Saint Aug, FL

customer_reviews.title: Incredible for the price
customer_reviews.text: Powering this tower off a cheap-ish 100W/ch receiver. Still gets plenty loud and sounds great. Make sure to position it properly in the room for the best bass response. Incredible deal for the price (got it on sale around $100). Don't pass this up if you can get a deal!!! Probably the best speaker at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for your sound system.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these to replace 4 older floor speakers that I use for my surround sound system. They sound great. Good crisp highs. Good mid range as well. The bass is not over powering and provides solid lows.
customer_reviews.author: RPG

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Replaced some heavy duty Pioneer HPM-100s that I felt were the best for the money. Still good for the money but these are more space conscious and have outstanding sound quality in all ranges. High, middle and low range is perfect. Can handle 100 watts per channel easily. Sturdy, base is substantial and easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Golden

customer_reviews.title: Forget the bass boost button
customer_reviews.text: The sound is excellent for such a small volume speakers. I did not expect such a deep bass. Middle and high are great as expected. Excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Korenkov

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my speakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought as replacement stereo speakers. Good sound reproduction for my music collection. Small footprint and great looking. Very impressed in the shipping packaging although USPS had thrown the speakers upside down in the back of the delivery truck and they still arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Triple B

customer_reviews.title: After great reviews on amazon
customer_reviews.text: After great reviews on amazon, purchased it for the sound quality remarks. Coupled the two floors speakers with "Energy 5.1 Take Classic Home Theater System (Set of Six, Black)" and "Sony STRDN1080 7.2 Channel Dolby Atmos Home Theater AV Receiver". Sound is simply Awesome !!!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: SONY, NO BALONEY !!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our OLD Sony HTS with a new Sony receiver and these left & right main speakers. They look and sound great... SONY, NO BALONEY !!
customer_reviews.author: James Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for $100 each. Great sound when paired with bass heavy book shelf speakers.
customer_reviews.author: swbo101

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: this is one set of ass-kicking speakers. I use them outside with an NAD amp to listen to Joe B. shred. I love 'em. Can't say the neighbors do.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Partridge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome towers!
customer_reviews.text: These have amazing sound quality for an insanely cheap price. Theyare very loud and clear. I have never had to turn my volume past 8 for movies to hear every bit of detail in a movie. Music also sounds fantastic on these bad boys. Very happy with my Sony towers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ries

customer_reviews.title: Buy these speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. Better than my old Sony's. Just wait til they break in. Very tight bass. A sub accents them nicely at low volume. I had to turn mine down. I think they're the nicest looking speakers in this price range especially with the grills off.
customer_reviews.author: linnear

customer_reviews.title: Great Sony Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and love them. The sound quality is exceptional and I would expect that from Sony. The price is great too when you can get them on sale but even if they are not on sale they are worth every penny! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie B

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome for the price range.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speakers. Good in the highs and mid range frequencies. Just ok on the bass but a subwoofer should complete the range. Just buy these speakers if you are tight on budget for high end speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Ravindra Tayi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was jumping around between a bunch of different brand floor speakers...got these for $98 each $100 off. Paired these with a Yamaha Aventage RX-A860. They are absolutely amazing with the sound they produce for music or movies. These speakers are really clear and actually get fairly loud! I'd recommend these if your looking at them!
customer_reviews.author: Austin M.

customer_reviews.title: Joyful Suprise!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I usually go with Polk, Definitive, and Klipsch. I got these on sale for $80 a piece and paired with my Onkyo RZ720, Definitive 2000 center channel and the sound is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: Mac79

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers, great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little speakers. They sound great when teamed up with a sub. Nice clear sound for movies and music is crisp and clean. They make great fronts but I use them for surrounds ( I have a big room with really big fronts). My AVR drives them good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric N.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Sony Towers
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and they sound great. They aren't a B&W replacement but for the price they far out preform the others I tested.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price! Also so much more manageable in size compared to the more expensive albeit better sounding tower speakers out there.
customer_reviews.author: CK1960

customer_reviews.title: Towers are SINGLES...
customer_reviews.text: TOWERS WERE NOT A PAIR! Everything else LOOKS good anyway. Hopefully the "dolby atmos" speakers sound better than I'm expecting. Looks like a normal 4" speaker on an angle to me. I got the whole set, but I guess I'll write another review after I break open the ol wallet again. 1 tower puts the whole thing on hold. I know this is a waste of a post, but I wanted to clear up the pairs question for all.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Over all decent buy.. happy. Use 4 of these for surround sound system.. ( T.V. ) pretty nice!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: value great value
customer_reviews.text: at less than 1oo dollars each great value front ports make placement easy adaquate bass u will want a sub for surround app with yamaha 683 at about 350 dollars agreat start on a nice surround system
customer_reviews.author: robert moseley

customer_reviews.title: Good product and sound
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Exactly what you would expect from Sony for the cost. Deep bass, crisp highs from a speaker that is small enough to be placed around the room with out notice.
customer_reviews.author: cameron carrothers

customer_reviews.title: Blown away at how good these speakers are
customer_reviews.text: Blown away at how good these speakers are. I got them for a good price on black Friday. I'm now in the process of adding the whole set together to replace my old speaker set up. Very happy with these speakers
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound!!! I bought these for my theater room and love them the bass within them is great and good range as well. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for a month or two. Great sound as part of my surround sound and for music.
customer_reviews.author: shawn b.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Best value for money, great sound, well made, nice looking, best,best, best.....
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speakers that look and sound like high end speakers!
customer_reviews.text: First let me say, I'm not a pro audio tech, but I've listened to a LOT of home theater systems and speakers. These Sony SSCS3 are awesome!! I bought each compenent- 2 floor standing, Sony SSCS5 book shelf speakers, SACS9 10" subwoofer. I went rouge and bought the yamaha Yamaha NS-C210BL for my center channel because it was so much smaller and fit in the space I had. All these together being pushed by a Sony STR DN1080, sound absolutely amazing. I could not be happier with the sound, quality and over all performance for TV, movies, streaming, bluetooth and music!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ballouskys

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound at half the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound at a reasonable price went and ordered the whole series including the sub woofer.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Loud and clear!
customer_reviews.text: Use them as my front left and right speakers in my 5.1 setup. They are a beast! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: SnakeByte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, sounds great. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha VanWinkle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these bad boys and my whole house is rockin!!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Michael

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Speakers for receiver. Hear things you can’t with regular speakers. Get very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for a great price. Perfect speakers to listen to music to.
customer_reviews.author: E. B.

customer_reviews.title: these speakers perform better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for a five star product. ..these speakers perform better than expected. I have an old Kenwood receiver and I wanted to hear my old albums. This Kenwood has a lot of power and I wanted speakers that could handle it, oh yeah! !!! Better than expected. ....
customer_reviews.author: Larry Paul Nees

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speakers, bought the hole set for my surround system.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price.
customer_reviews.text: great speaker, just remember it is only one unit, not a pair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kohlbecker

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, excellent price. My turntable never sounded so nice. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged to insure safe arrival and Operational sound is ...
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged to insure safe arrival and Operational sound is as expected of Sony. AJP
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: 3 Way speakers produce a nice, rich tone
customer_reviews.text: After very short burn out, a few times, I was pleasantly surprised at the overall sound, 3 Way speakers produce a nice, rich tone, yet not overly on the bass. To give these speakers proper credit, which I have had a few weeks to test and am certainly satisfied with this purchase. Also added 3way book shelf which all are Sony and I am and it has an amazing sound. Of Course there are more expensive speakers on the market, but for my money .Sony has always had a good reputation in products and service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers and Build Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers considering the price and shipping. They look great, sound wonderful and the build quality is top notch. They’re replacing my 16year old KLH towers and they’re a nice needed upgrade. I have them paired with a little 6” subwoofer and the system sounds amazing again. Can’t go wrong with these but mind you they’re $100 speakers. Not $500 speakers. But for my townhome basement they're perfect. Thanks Sony.
customer_reviews.author: 1080p

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Liking these a lot. Bought them primarily for movie night in the garden but work great in the tv room. I'm not an audiophile so the others can comment on that but I'm not feeling the urge to get a subwoofer or center speaker. Did however get some small speakers for behind the couch which complimented well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Grantham

customer_reviews.title: great sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing. My next buy will be the center channel speaker in the same series
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers. Remember you only get one tower speaker ...
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers. Remember you only get one tower speaker not two. I bought one speaker off of here and the other elsewhere. But the main purpose was to have music at my work in a huge warehouse. The sound quality is excellent by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Great set, especially if you add the Sony Core center channel. Very good clarity, depth, and range... especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Highly recomended
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Highly recomended! I bought this to my dad! He loves it! He is so happy! Great quality product! Very safety package. Came in time. Deserved 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these speakers already!
customer_reviews.text: I finally purchased these speakers and couldn't be more satisfied with their performance. The lows, mids, and highs sound great with all the different kinds of music that I listen to (rock, jazz, metal, classical, electronic). Even at loud volumes these speakers retain their clear quality. Overall I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris tracy

customer_reviews.title: They are speakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these speakers and connected them to my stereo. Dialed in, in a good room, they sound like live music. Having nice speakers at an affordable price point is so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome speakers for the price.. Stacked up against my infinity as well as the B&W book shelf they are superior.
customer_reviews.author: Pal Al

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these speakers on sale, I can tell you it has very good sound for the price. Most other tower speakers will run you almost $100 more each. Pairing these with a 5.1 4k receiver and center channel give my living room plenty of luxurious sound.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: excellent speakers!!! brought the system to life. was using some Samsung speakers from an older system and these just go so well with the sony receiver we have!! crisp and clear, no complaints at all!!! awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers Sony
customer_reviews.text: I purchased from best buy, but these speakers are great, especially if you get them on sale. I got mine for 150 each and they are amazing. Small room, bass does not need to be turned up, medium size rooms, definitely turn up for movies and low bass songs. Large rooms bass needs to be turned all the way up, treble could also be bumped up a little as it helps bring the vocals out a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Like'em
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my front surround L & R. Sounds good, I tried to go without a center channel speaker, but the voices were drowned out. Bought the Sony Center channel speaker that matches this set and everything came together great. Would recommend these to anyone. My living room is around 15x12 with vaulted ceilings, and the sound is crisp throughout the room.
customer_reviews.author: Adudas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think for the money they are a decent speakers
customer_reviews.author: carole fallucca

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, went and listened to 2 thousand dollar ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound, went and listened to 2 thousand dollar speakers, these speakers beat them would definitely recommend Sony speakers, they have the highs Lowe's and middle,
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: ... and something and this one came in the box like new very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought one brand new for 300 and something and this one came in the box like new very happy:) oh this one was half the price
customer_reviews.author: Rob Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I did not have this package. and let me ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not have this package. and let me know they I see there are two speakers Floor-standing on your website.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Get these speakers while the price is down, cannot beat the excellent sound. Needed a pair(note that these speakers are sold separately) that would replace my decade old bose floorstanders. Sound is nice and crisp for movies,games, and music on my ps4.
customer_reviews.author: B. Doan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were great speakers until one of my towers started picking up some artifacts in the 100hz area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surround Single Speaker....
customer_reviews.text: I did like it but it did not have no wires on the item.....
customer_reviews.author: Frank Romero

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: FLAT OUT AWESOME! Great speaker for the price. Well built & packaged.
customer_reviews.author: DiNo

product_meta.title: Sony SSCS3 3-Way Floor-Standing Speaker (Single) - Black
product_meta.description: Introducing a speaker series versatile enough to deliver an unprecedented and real audio experience, and with a soundstage so expansive you can feel the energy and passion of the original performance, all while staying in harmony with your existing living spaces-no special listening room or setup required. Frequency Response: 45 Hz–50 kHz
feature_bullets: 3-way, 4-speaker bass-reflex system, 5-1/4 inches Foamed-Mica Cellular Reinforced Woofer, 1 inch Polyester Main Tweeter
3/4 inches Sony Super Tweeter for immersive sound staging, Sound Reproduction to 50kHz (for High Resolution Audio), 6 ohm Speaker Impedance
Optimized Crossover componentry for a clear audio path, 145 W Maximum Input Power, One Speaker per Carton

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars236 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
